name: cordova-plugin-ios-camera-permissions
author: Andreas Jacob <andreas@cordobo.de> (http://cordobo.com/)
description: Cordova / PhoneGap Plugin Permission Settings for NSCameraUsageDescription, NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription, NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription and NSMicrophoneUsageDescription in iOS 11 by adding a declaration to the Info.plist file
